item.title: UNODC Digital Forensic Africa [ Android - Week One]
item.description: Hi, today am going to show you i solved a week one of Africa Digital forensic Competiton powered by United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC) which is third time now under their programme called GLOBAL PROGRAMME on CYBER CRIME here we go HashPotatos - (2 pts) What is the SHA256 hash of the compressed Android data? answer: aeb95fe9ed2dabefef786c3dc620b0cd92255476c7a9be01049cb05d995a39f9 walkthrough : using sha256sum EZTZ (5 pts) What time zone was the phone set to?
